Source

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Source.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game is the class that represents the Goose Game itself

    A Game is characterized by the following informations :

    • A board, which represents the the Goose Game's board
    • An amount of players for the current Game.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leo JUMEL et Brice NUZZO

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Player> initialize()
        Game initializer.

        This class method allows the user to select a number of players and initiate their names in the game. It returns a Player ArrayList used to initiate the Board.

        Returns:
        A Player ArrayList.

      • play

        public void play(int mode)
        Game main method.

        Handle the main part of the game process.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Game end conditions.

        Allow the game to know if it is finished or not.

        Returns:
        True if the game is finished, false otherwise.

      • throwDie

        public int throwDie()
        Dice throw.

        Rolls two dice.

        Returns:
        an integer between 2 and 12.
